# Installing fBasics

The R package ‘fBasics’ provides a collection of functions to explore
and to investigate basic properties of financial returns and related
quantities. The covered fields include techniques of explorative data
analysis and the investigation of distributional properties, including
parameter estimation and hypothesis testing. Even more there are several
utility functions for data handling and management.

Package `fBasics` is part of the Rmetrics suite of R packages and is
developed on R-forge at
[fBasics](https://r-forge.r-project.org/scm/viewvc.php/pkg/fBasics/?root=rmetrics).
The root of Rmetrics is at
[R-forge](https://r-forge.r-project.org/projects/rmetrics).

Install the [latest stable
version](https://cran.r-project.org/package=fBasics) of `fBasics` from
CRAN:

``` R
install.packages("fBasics")
```

You can install the [development
version](https://r-forge.r-project.org/scm/viewvc.php/pkg/fBasics/?root=rmetrics)
of `fBasics` from R-forge:

``` R
install.packages("fBasics", repos = "http://R-Forge.R-project.org")
```

To report bugs visit
[Rmetrics](https://r-forge.r-project.org/projects/rmetrics/).

# Documentation

You can view the documentation of `fBasics` at
[fBasicsDoc](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/) or download the
[reference
manual](https://cran.r-project.org/package=fBasics/fBasics.pdf) of the
latest release from CRAN.

# Package index

## Overview of package fBasics

- [`fBasics-package`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/00fBasics-package.md)
  [`fBasics`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/00fBasics-package.md)
  : Portfolio modelling, optimization and backtesting
- [`fBasicsData`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`Capitalization`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`cars2`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`DowJones30`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`HedgeFund`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`msft.dat`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`nyse`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`PensionFund`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`swissEconomy`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`SWXLP`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  [`usdthb`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/data-examples.md)
  : fBasics data sets

## Tests

- [`correlationTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-correlationTest.md)
  [`pearsonTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-correlationTest.md)
  [`kendallTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-correlationTest.md)
  [`spearmanTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-correlationTest.md)
  : Correlation tests

- [`ksnormTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`jbTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`shapiroTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`normalTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`jarqueberaTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`dagoTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`adTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`cvmTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`lillieTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`pchiTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  [`sfTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-normalityTests.md)
  : Tests for normality

- [`ks2Test()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-ks2Test.md)
  : Two sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov test

- [`locationTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-locationTest.md)
  : Two sample location tests

- [`scaleTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-scaleTest.md)
  : Two sample scale tests

- [`varianceTest()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/test-varianceTest.md)
  : Two sample variance tests

- [`fHTEST-class`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fHTEST-class.md)
  [`fHTEST`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fHTEST-class.md)
  [`show,fHTEST-method`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fHTEST-class.md)
  :

  Class `"fHTEST"`

## Other statistical functions

- [`pdl()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-pdl.md)
  : Polynomial distributed lags
- [`basicStats()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-basicStats.md)
  : Basic time series statistics
- [`dmaxdd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-maxdd.md)
  [`pmaxdd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-maxdd.md)
  [`rmaxdd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-maxdd.md)
  [`maxddStats()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-maxdd.md)
  : Drawdown statistics
- [`rowStats()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowSds()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowVars()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowSkewness()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowKurtosis()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowMaxs()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowMins()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowProds()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowQuantiles()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowStdevs()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  [`rowAvgs()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-rowStats.md)
  : Row statistics
- [`normMED()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-normRobMoments.md)
  [`normIQR()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-normRobMoments.md)
  [`normSKEW()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-normRobMoments.md)
  [`normKURT()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-normRobMoments.md)
  : Robust moments for the Normal distribution
- [`sampleMED()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-sampleLMoments.md)
  [`sampleIQR()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-sampleLMoments.md)
  [`sampleSKEW()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-sampleLMoments.md)
  [`sampleKURT()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-sampleLMoments.md)
  : Robust moments for the GLD
- [`sampleLmoments()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-sampleRobMoments.md)
  : Sample L-moments
- [`set.lcgseed()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-randLCG.md)
  [`get.lcgseed()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-randLCG.md)
  [`runif.lcg()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-randLCG.md)
  [`rnorm.lcg()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-randLCG.md)
  [`rt.lcg()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-randLCG.md)
  : Generator for Portable random innovations
- [`volatility()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/volatility.md)
  : Compute volatility

## Distributions and distribution fitting

- [`nFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-DistributionFits.md)
  [`tFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-DistributionFits.md)
  [`stableFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-DistributionFits.md)
  : Fit normal, Student-t and stable distributions

- [`fDISTFIT-class`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fDISTFIT-class.md)
  [`show,fDISTFIT-method`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fDISTFIT-class.md)
  :

  Class `"fDISTFIT"`

- [`distCheck()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-distCheck.md)
  : Distribution check

## Hyperbolic Distribution

- [`dhyp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hyp.md)
  [`phyp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hyp.md)
  [`qhyp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hyp.md)
  [`rhyp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hyp.md)
  : Hyperbolic distribution
- [`hypFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypFit.md)
  : Fit a hyperbolic distribution
- [`hypMode()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypMode.md)
  : Hyperbolic mode
- [`hypMean()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypMoments.md)
  [`hypVar()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypMoments.md)
  [`hypSkew()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypMoments.md)
  [`hypKurt()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypMoments.md)
  [`hypMoments()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypMoments.md)
  : Hyperbolic distribution moments
- [`hypMED()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypRobMoments.md)
  [`hypIQR()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypRobMoments.md)
  [`hypSKEW()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypRobMoments.md)
  [`hypKURT()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypRobMoments.md)
  : Robust moments for the HYP
- [`hypSlider()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-hypSlider.md)
  : Hyperbolic distribution slider

  Generalized Hyperbolic Distribution

- [`ghMode()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghMode.md)

  : Generalized Hyperbolic Distribution Slider

  : Generalized Hyperbolic Student-t Mode
- [`ghtMean()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtMoments.md)
  [`ghtVar()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtMoments.md)
  [`ghtSkew()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtMoments.md)
  [`ghtKurt()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtMoments.md)

  [`ghtIQR()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtRobMoments.md)
  [`ghtSKEW()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtRobMoments.md)
  [`ghtKURT()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ghtRobMoments.md)

## Generalized Lambda Distribution

- [`dgld()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-gld.md)
  [`pgld()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-gld.md)
  [`qgld()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-gld.md)

  : GH Distribution Fit
- [`gldMode()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-gldMode.md)
  : Generalized Lambda Distribution Mode

## Normal Inverse Gaussian Distribution

- [`dnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nig.md)
  [`pnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nig.md)
  [`qnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nig.md)
  [`rnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nig.md)
  : Normal Inverse Gaussian Distribution
- [`nigFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigFit.md)
  : Fit of a Normal Inverse Gaussian Distribution
- [`nigMode()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigMode.md)
  : Normal Inverse Gaussian Mode
- [`nigMean()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigMoments.md)
  [`nigVar()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigMoments.md)
  [`nigSkew()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigMoments.md)
  [`nigKurt()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigMoments.md)
  : Moments for the Normal Inverse Gaussian
- [`nigMED()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigRobMoments.md)
  [`nigIQR()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigRobMoments.md)
  [`nigSKEW()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigRobMoments.md)
  [`nigKURT()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigRobMoments.md)
  : Robust Moments for the NIG
- [`nigShapeTriangle()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigShapeTriangle.md)
  : NIG Shape Triangle
- [`nigSlider()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-nigSlider.md)
  : nigerbolic Distribution Slider

## Standardized distributions

- [`dsgh()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sgh.md)
  [`psgh()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sgh.md)
  [`qsgh()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sgh.md)
  [`rsgh()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sgh.md)
  : Standardized Generalized Hyperbolic Distribution
- [`sghFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sghFit.md)
  : Standardized GH distribution fit
- [`dsght()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sght.md)
  [`psght()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sght.md)
  [`qsght()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sght.md)
  [`rsght()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-sght.md)
  : Standardized generalized hyperbolic Student-t Distribution
- [`dsnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-snig.md)
  [`psnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-snig.md)
  [`qsnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-snig.md)
  [`rsnig()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-snig.md)
  : Standardized Normal Inverse Gaussian Distribution
- [`snigFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-snigFit.md)
  : Fit of a Standardized NIG Distribution

## Spline smoothed distribution

- [`dssd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ssd.md)
  [`pssd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ssd.md)
  [`qssd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ssd.md)
  [`rssd()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ssd.md)
  : Spline Smoothed Distribution
- [`ssdFit()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/dist-ssdFit.md)
  : Fit density using smoothing splines

## Vector and matrix utilities

- [`colVec()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-colVec.md)
  [`rowVec()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-colVec.md)
  : Column and row vectors
- [`gridVector()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-gridVector.md)
  : Grid vector coordinates
- [`hilbert()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-hilbert.md)
  : Hilbert matrix
- [`inv()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-inv.md)
  : The inverse of a matrix
- [`kron()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-kron.md)
  : Kronecker product
- [`norm2()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-norm.md)
  : Matrix norm
- [`pascal()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-pascal.md)
  : Pascal matrix
- [`isPositiveDefinite()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-posDefinite.md)
  [`makePositiveDefinite()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-posDefinite.md)
  : Positive definite matrices
- [`rk()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-rk.md)
  : The rank of a matrix
- [`tr()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-tr.md)
  : Trace of a matrix
- [`triang()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-triang.md)
  [`Triang()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-triang.md)
  : Upper and lower triangular matrices
- [`tslag()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-tslag.md)
  : Lagged or leading vector/matrix
- [`vec()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-vech.md)
  [`vech()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/matrix-vech.md)
  : Stacking vectors and matrices

## Plotting

- [`acfPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-acfPlot.md)
  [`pacfPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-acfPlot.md)
  [`lacfPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-acfPlot.md)
  [`teffectPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-acfPlot.md)
  : Autocorrelation function plots
- [`boxPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-boxPlot.md)
  [`boxPercentilePlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-boxPlot.md)
  : Time series box plots
- [`histPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-histPlot.md)
  [`densityPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-histPlot.md)
  [`logDensityPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-histPlot.md)
  : Histogram and density plots
- [`qqnormPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-qqPlot.md)
  [`qqnigPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-qqPlot.md)
  [`qqghtPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-qqPlot.md)
  [`qqgldPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-qqPlot.md)
  : Quantile-quantile plots
- [`returnSeriesGUI()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-returnSeriesGUI.md)
  : Return series plots
- [`scalinglawPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-scalinglawPlot.md)
  : Scaling law behaviour
- [`seriesPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-seriesPlot.md)
  [`cumulatedPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-seriesPlot.md)
  [`returnPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-seriesPlot.md)
  [`drawdownPlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/plot-seriesPlot.md)
  : Financial time series plots
- [`stableSlider()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stableSlider.md)
  : Slider GUI for Stable Distribution
- [`interactivePlot()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-interactivePlot.md)
  : Interactive Plot Utility

## Interpolation

- [`linearInterp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-interpLinear.md)
  [`linearInterpp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-interpLinear.md)
  : Bivariate Linear Interpolation
- [`krigeInterp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-interpKrige.md)
  : Bivariate Krige Interpolation
- [`akimaInterp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-interpAkima.md)
  [`akimaInterpp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/stats-interpAkima.md)
  : Bivariate Spline Interpolation

## Special functions

- [`Heaviside()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-Heaviside.md)
  [`Sign()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-Heaviside.md)
  [`Delta()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-Heaviside.md)
  [`Boxcar()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-Heaviside.md)
  [`Ramp()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-Heaviside.md)
  : Heaviside and related functions
- [`tsHessian()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-hessian.md)
  : Two sided approximated Hessian

  : Named colors in R

  [`heatPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`terrainPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)

  [`greyPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`timPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`rampPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`seqPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`divPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`qualiPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`focusPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  [`monoPalette()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorPalette.md)
  : Color palettes
- [`characterTable()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-characterTable.md)
  : Table of characters
- [`colorTable()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colorTable.md)
  : Table of colors
- [`symbolTable()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-symbolTable.md)
  : Table of symbols
- [`decor()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-decor.md)
  [`hgrid()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-decor.md)
  [`vgrid()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-decor.md)
  [`boxL()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-decor.md)
  [`box_()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-decor.md)
  [`copyright()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-decor.md)
  : Functions for decorating plots

  : Deprecated functions in package fBasics

## Reexported functions

The following functions are re-exported from packages ‘timeDate’ and
‘timeSeries’, for convenience. If you need more functionality from those
packages, run ‘library()’ in your session.

- [`as.timeSeries`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fBasics-reexports.md)
  [`kurtosis`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fBasics-reexports.md)
  [`skewness`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/fBasics-reexports.md)
  : Objects exported from other packages

(which serve as default methods). Seem abandoned. Remove?

- [`stdev(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/baseMethods.md)
  [`termPlot(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/baseMethods.md)
  : Generic functions extensions

- [`colIds()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colIds.md)
  [`rowIds()`](https://geobosh.github.io/fBasicsDoc/reference/utils-colIds.md)
  : Set and retrieve column/row names
